name: Replica Tridrone
languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

traits.Axiomatic Mind: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.
traits.Dismantlable: If the replica tridrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.Multiattack: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.
actions.Fist: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
